name: @akashic/akashic-cli-export
description: A module to convert your Akashic game to a runnable standalone.

scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.clean: shx rm -rf lib && shx rm -rf spec/build
scripts.build: npm run build:app && npm run copy:pdi && npm run build:template
scripts.copy:pdi: npm run copy:pdi:v1 && npm run copy:pdi:v2 && npm run copy:pdi:v3
scripts.copy:pdi:v1: shx mkdir -p lib/template/v1/js && shx cp -r lib/pdi lib/template/v1/js
scripts.copy:pdi:v2: shx mkdir -p lib/template/v2/js && shx cp -r lib/pdi lib/template/v2/js
scripts.copy:pdi:v3: shx mkdir -p lib/template/v3/js && shx cp -r lib/pdi lib/template/v3/js
scripts.build:template: npm run build:template:v1 && npm run build:template:v2 && npm run build:template:v3 && npm run build:template:ejs
scripts.build:template:v1: cd src/template/template-export-html-v1 && npm install --no-package-lock && npm run build && cd ../../
scripts.build:template:v2: cd src/template/template-export-html-v2 && npm install --no-package-lock && npm run build && cd ../../
scripts.build:template:v3: cd src/template/template-export-html-v3 && npm install --no-package-lock && npm run build && cd ../../
scripts.build:template:ejs: shx cp src/template/bundle-index.ejs lib/template/ && shx cp src/template/no-bundle-index.ejs lib/template/
scripts.test: npm run test:vitest && npm run lint

author: DWANGO Co., Ltd.
